thread.title: Marvel’s Thor to film down under
thread.title_full: Marvel’s Thor to film down under

title: Marvel’s Thor to film down under
text: Thor and Alien sequels to be shot in Oz 14:33 PM KARA VICKERY IF the backdrops of the next Thor and Alien films look a little familier, it’s because they’re going to be shot right here in Australia. What’s a rope access technician? 14:01 PM Rebecca Sullivan BESIDE his wicked bone structure and adorable “cool bananas” jokes, fans of The Bachelorette are obsessed with Richie’s job. New Thor movie to film in Queensland 13:56 PM ANDREW POTTS GET ready for the god of thunder down under - Hollywood blockbuster Thor is coming our way. This spy is well worth catching 13:42 PM By Leigh Paatsch National Film Critic REVIEW: Bridge of Spies is a classy, wholly satisfying offering that sits comfortably and deservedly alongside Steven Spielberg’s Lincoln and War Horse. A pash-based dating show is coming 13:33 PM Charlotte Willis SEVEN is jumping on the bandwagon with a brand new dating show. It’s called Kiss Bang Love, and you won’t believe what the contestants have to do. Cruel Intentions TV series in the works 12:50 PM Staff Writers IT LOOKS like Cruel Intentions is the latest film to be given a reboot, with a small screen adaptation reportedly in the works with NBC. People’s Day hit for Hobart Show 12:42 PM ALEX LUTTRELL UP to 15,000 people are expected to flock to People’s Day at the Royal Hobart Show. Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet 12:32 PM Network Vision SHE was only trying to help. Beyonce’s assistant felt the pop queen’s wrath when she got between her and the cameras on the red carpet overnight.
